DeviceDescription: Mobile robot with autonomous driving capabilities.

Skills.SkillDescription: Move the mobile robot to a pre-defined position: (1) parking slot, (2) patient room.
Waiting for user interaction in Rviz visualisation tool. Set a 2D Goal position on loaded map in rviz using the UI button.
